title: Chufa Ba Lu Qi
synopsis: Panda Ruqi, Toby the flying squirrel, and the fantasy creature Buffy live a carefree life on the fantasy island. One day, Lucci learned from his adoptive father, Master Pelican, that he was from the Panda Valley. So Buffy, Toby and Rucci embarked on a journey to find Panda Valley. On the way, they helped people in distress, met their new partner, Buck, and met various fantasy creatures. They experienced all kinds of difficulties and obstacles, and finally achieved their goal. (translated from iqiyi)
